mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dhcp_fixed_ip (site_id, network, ipaddr, macaddr, comment, disable, update_time) VALUES ( #{site_id}, #{network}, #{ipaddr}, #{macaddr}, #{comment}, #{disable}, now() )
